Sequence your samples through the cloud.

Meenta is a cloud-sequencing platform where scientists can instantly find, book and send samples to host instruments.

Have an instrument with excess capacity? Become a host

How it works

How it works

Search by read type, read length, instrument type, location and date. View live instrument capacity that you can book instantly or reserve.

Instantly book your lanes

Choose your instruments and ship your samples. Labels, shipping, and data transfer is handled for you.

Submission and Delivery Deadlines

Timeline of events that will impact your booking. Learn more

Do it all from your phone

Monitor your samples and book lanes or accept requests from any device. Download your data from the Meenta Cloud when your data is ready.

Book an instrument

Search and instantly book an instrument now. Little setup and no emails or quotes.

Get started now

Become a host

Start utilizing excess capacity on your instruments today. Use Meenta's LIMS or connect Meenta to your existing system.

Become a host now
